comments.en:
Prints only full, unidirectional sweeps with free software

This is a rebadged Lexmark X11, therefore it can be used with the same drivers as the X11.

The Compaq cartridges are the same as the Lexmark ones except for a little plastic tab designed to make them mutually incompatible. Probably you can break off the tab and have it work. (Not that there's much point; both lines of cartridges cost a bundle).

Consumables/Refills: black (Standard Yield P/N 12A1970, High Yield P/N 12A1975) color
